message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This ensures a fair distribution while considering the potential loss due to inflation.
I believe a 60/40 split is more fair, as it acknowledges the potential for inflation but also allows for a more equitable distribution. Let's work together to make the most of this opportunity.
Considering the inflation and Bob's previous proposal, I suggest a 60/40 split. This maintains fairness while adjusting to the current value of the money.
